name: Picnic TD
description:
Picnic TD is a tower defense game which takes place in a picnic date at a cottage. The picnic date is ruined by goblins who are trying to steal the picnic basket. In order to avoid the date being ruined, you have to defend the picnic basket from being stolen by the goblins by upgrading your towers. To find and upgrade the towers you have to harvest the wheat which is covering the map. Besides harvesting wheat you also have to gather meat from the goblins in order to feed your farmers so they dont run out of energy to attack.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Left click/space - Harvest/attack

Left click to upgrade

Credits:
Stefan Tanderup - Programming
Alireza Amini - Game Design

Assets used for the game:

REXARD -Wooden UI
POLYGON - Farm Pack
POLYGON MINI - Fantasy Characters Pack
GameDev Market - Cosy Farm Music Pack
GameDev Market - Mega SFX Pack
GameDev Market -Inventory Potion Food And Consumable Icons
Font: Fairy cottage https://mistifonts.com/fairy-cottage/
lizhiqiang - Low Poly Picnic Asset Pack
